Articles.Content:
Hi

I'm messing with something and need to find a way to find the active EVA Kerbal, specifically to find some transforms in its bone rig. There was a mod ages ago that let you mess with moving the Kerbals around to sort iof script custom animations, but I can't remember what it was called to find it. I'm sure the source would have what I need if it was ever released.

Any pointers either way?

Cheers!

- - - Updated - - -

Ooops, I meant to put this in add-on dev. Mods: please?
